overview: This is the story of Jenna, a beautiful but broke young girl who must live with her wild sister to survive. Exposed to the seedy Hollywood lifestyle, Jenna becomes discouraged and seeks comfort in a sweet young woman who's brother is a top notch director in town. Jenna gets offered the part of a lifetime but now has to deal with greed and jealousy of her sister and friends. To keep herself true she must choose between stardom or true love and happiness
title: Picture Perfect
